short_summary: Aeronautical Multi-band and Value-Added Satellite Services Contract
description: The solicitation is for a 3 year contract plus 4
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal Notice

## Proposal Title

* English: **Aeronautical Multi-band and Value-Added Satellite Services**
* French: **Services par satellite multibande à valeur ajoutée pour le secteur aéronautique**

## Solicitation Details

* Solicitation Number: **BPM017447/20891**
* Solicitation Title: **Aeronautical Multi-band and Value-Added Satellite Services**
* Reference Number: **SSC-23-00020891/T**
* Amendment Number: **7**
* Notice Type: **Request for Proposal**
* Notice Type Description: This solicitation is a Request for Proposal for the supply of Aeronautical Multi-band and Value-Added Satellite Services.

## Contract Details

* Contracting Entity: **Shared Services Canada**
* End User Entity: **Shared Services Canada**
* Contract Term: 
	+ Contract Term: 3 years
	+ Optional 4 additional 1-year terms

## Important Information

* The contract will be used by Shared Services Canada and/or other departments and agencies to provide shared services to one or more of its clients.
* Bidders can register in the SSC P2P portal to participate in this solicitation.
* The following trade agreements apply to this solicitation:
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

## Solicitation Documents

The solicitation documents are available in English and French on the SSC P2P portal. Here are the links to the documents:

* [attached documents section]

## Contact Information

For questions or clarification regarding this solicitation, please contact Nathalie Houle:
* Email: [Nathalie.m.Houle@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:Nathalie.m.Houle@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 613-301-5101
* Fax: 613-960-6007

## Tender Closing Date

The tender closing date
